release_notes: NEW: Nested Variable Resolution - Variables can reference other variables up to 10 levels deep
NEW: Cross-scope nesting - Environment and collection variables can reference each other
NEW: Enhanced tooltips show fully resolved nested variable values
NEW: Dynamic variable support in nested contexts ({{$guid}}, {{$timestamp}}, etc.)
NEW: Circular reference protection prevents infinite loops
NEW: Partial resolution gracefully handles missing nested variables
NEW: Postman-compatible {{$variableName}} syntax for dynamic variables
FIXED: Tooltip display now shows fully resolved values instead of raw nested references
IMPROVED: Enhanced variable resolution with comprehensive test coverage (7 new tests)
